author: Liz Landers, Jesse Seidman, Michael Learmonth
title: Ex-FEMA Chief Says Trump Owns the Coronavirus Crisis: 'You Don't Get to Blame the Other Team'
description: “If you've been in office for three-and-a-half years, you don't get to blame the other team anymore. You own it.”
content:
Former FEMA Administrator Craig Fugate knows a thing or two about mobilizing a nation during a crisis: he was the FEMA administrator during President Barack Obamas administration and oversaw the response to numerous natural disasters, and Hurricane Sandy. 
 … [+1725 chars]
